TopicTitle: How to bring a 0.90 career save into 1.0.5?

Articles.Content:
I am running a quite heavily modded career game and I would like to transfer into the latest version of KSP without losing my progress, is this possible?

I am currently running in 0.90 with 32 active flights (I am not concerned about the debris or asteroids that also fill up the persistence file).

I have got myself a 1.0.5 install with the same mod setup, I had to fudge about getting part names to line up a little due to mods changing, but I'm pretty sure I got that sorted.
I have tried simply transferring the persistence file into a new game created in 1.0.5 and although the vessels do show up in the tracking screen, I cannot select them or start to fly them.

Also, are there any hints people have about dealing with long persistence files? selecting individual craft can be quite a chore of scrolling and hoping not to miss the beginning or end of the section, is there a way I can make pulling individual craft out easier?

I don't know about bringing the old game in...

For the problem with selecting your craft, try the Targetron mod by hashashin. It places a list (which can be minimised) on screen while flying. You can use this to select the craft you want to target or fly.

Regards Brad
